answer: The National Suicide Prevention Lifeline is available 24/7. You can call 1-800-273-8255 or visit www.suicidepreventionlifeline.org.
answer_formatted: The National Suicide Prevention Lifeline is available 24/7. You can call 1-800-273-8255 or visit www.suicidepreventionlifeline.org.
